mapper.select:
SELECT ATTP.Account_Name AS accountName, ATTP.Account_ID AS accountId FROM (
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId}) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId}) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID ) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} )
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) )
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) )
) TDS
LEFT JOIN (SELECT AD.Account_Name, TD.ID, AD.Account_ID FROM Account_Data AD LEFT JOIN T_Employee_Basic TEB ON TEB.Account=AD.Account_ID LEFT JOIN T_Department TD ON TD.ID = TEB.Department_ID LEFT JOIN Position_Data PD ON PD.Position_ID=AD.Position_ID WHERE AD.Account_State='在用' AND TEB.State=1 AND TEB.isDelete=0 AND AD.Account_ID != #{accountId}
AND (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 4 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 OR ((SELECT ID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId})=39 AND (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) = 4) THEN 74 END) )
AND (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 4 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) )
AND (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 4 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) )
AND ((PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 4 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) ) OR (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 33 END) )) AND PD.Position_ID !=93
AND ((PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 4 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) ) OR (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 33 END) )) AND PD.Position_ID !=93
AND ((PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 4 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) ) OR (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) < 4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=4 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 33 END) ))
)ATTP ON ATTP.ID=TDS.ID WHERE ATTP.Account_Name IS NOT NULL

SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 50 END)

SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId}) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID =(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID= (SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}) AND 54=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}))) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID ) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} )
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) )
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) )
) TDS

)ATTP ON ATTP.ID=TDS.ID WHERE ATTP.Account_Name IS NOT NULL

SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId}) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID= (SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}) AND 54=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}))) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId}) OR TD.ID =(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=#{departId}) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID =(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId})) OR TD.ID IN (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID= (SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}) AND 54=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}))) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 39 END) OR TD.ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 50 END)
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0) OR TD.ID=#{departId} OR TD.ID =(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}))
SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId} AND TD.ID !=0
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID ) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId} )
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) )
SELECT TDA.ID FROM (SELECT TD.ID,TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD )TDA WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TD.ID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) AND TDA.ParentID= TD.ID) OR TDA.ParentID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) ) OR TDA.ID=( SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=(SELECT ParentID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId}) )
) TDS
LEFT JOIN (SELECT AD.Account_Name, TD.ID, AD.Account_ID FROM Account_Data AD LEFT JOIN T_Employee_Basic TEB ON TEB.Account=AD.Account_ID LEFT JOIN T_Department TD ON TD.ID = TEB.Department_ID LEFT JOIN Position_Data PD ON PD.Position_ID=AD.Position_ID WHERE AD.Account_State='在用' AND TEB.State=1 AND TEB.isDelete=0 AND AD.Account_ID != #{accountId}
AND (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})<=4 THEN 5 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT ID FROM T_Department WHERE ID=#{departId})=39 THEN 74 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 33 END) )
AND (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})<=4 THEN 5 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})>=5 THEN 33 END) )
AND (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) <=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) )
AND ((PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) <=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) ) OR (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) <=4 THEN 6 END) )) AND PD.Position_ID !=93
AND ((PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})<=4 THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) ) OR (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})<=4 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 33 END) )) AND PD.Position_ID !=93
AND ((PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) <=4 AND 0 = #{dayNum} THEN 5 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) <=4 AND 1 = #{dayNum} THEN 6 WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=6 THEN 33 END) ) OR (PD.PositionType_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId}) <=4 THEN 6 END) OR PD.Position_ID=(CASE WHEN (SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId})=5 THEN 33 END) ))
)ATTP ON ATTP.ID=TDS.ID WHERE ATTP.Account_Name IS NOT NULL

SELECT (CASE WHEN TD.ID=0 THEN 0 WHEN (SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=23)=0 THEN 1 WHEN (SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=23))=0 THEN 2 WHEN (SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=(SELECT TD.ParentID FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=23)))=0 THEN 3 END) AS level FROM T_Department TD WHERE TD.ID=#{departId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE Leave_Daoxiu SET
Reason=#{reason} , StartTime=#{startTime}, EndTime=#{endTime} , LeaveTotal=#{leaveTotal} , WorkTime=#{workTime} , WorkTotal=#{workTotal} , Leave_Remark=#{leaveRemark} ,
Account1=#{account1}, Time1=#{time1},
Result1=1, Result1=0,
Remark1=#{remark1},
Account2=#{account2}, Time2=#{time2},
Result2=0, Result2=1,
Remark2=#{remark2},
Account3=#{account3}, Time3=#{time3},
Result3=1, Result3=0,
Remark3=#{remark3},
Time4=#{time4},
Result4=1, Result4=0,
Remark4=#{remark4}, Account4=#{account4}
AND LeaveAccount=#{leaveAccount}
AND ID=#{id}

UPDATE Personnel SET Department_ID=#{departmentId}, Position_ID=#{positionId}, Apply_Time=#{applyTime}, Need_Time=#{needTime}, Apply_Reason=#{applyReason}, Num=#{num},
Shencha_ID=#{shenchaId}, Shencha_Time=#{shenchaTime}, Shencha_Advice=#{shenchaAdvice}, Shencha_See=#{shenchaSee},
Renli_ID=#{renliId}, Renli_Time=#{renliTime}, Renli_Advice=#{renliAdvice}, Renli_See=#{renliSee},
Shenpi_ID=#{shenpiId}, Shenpi_Time=#{shenpiTime}, Shenpi_Advice=#{shenpiAdvice}, Shenpi_See=#{shenpiSee},
Apply_ID=#{applyId}, Is_Yes=#{isYes}, Yes_Time=#{yesTime}, Sex=#{sex}, Age=#{age}, Obsterical=#{obsterical}, Education=#{education}, Major=#{major}, Industry=#{industry}, YearsOfWorking=#{yearsOfWorking}, Job_Happing=#{jobHapping}, Computer_Level=#{computerLevel}, ForeignLanguage_Level=#{foreignLanguageLevel}, Essential_Condition=#{essentialCondition}, File_name=#{supplement}, Supplement=#{fileName}, Apply_type=#{applyType}, state=#{state},
1==1
AND P.ID =#{id}
mapper.select: select ID AS id,Name AS name from Business
select ID AS id,Name AS name from Major
select ID AS id,Name AS name from Job_time
select ID AS id,Name AS name from Tiaocao_cishu
select ID AS id,Name AS name from Age_tab
SELECT PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data WHERE Position_ID=#{positionId}

SELECT Account_ID AS id ,Account_Name AS name FROM Account_Data AD LEFT JOIN Position_Data PD ON AD.Position_ID=PD.Position_ID LEFT JOIN Position_Type PT ON PD.PositionType_ID=PT.PositionType_ID WHERE AD.Position_ID= (CASE WHEN ( SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD LEFT JOIN Position_Type PT ON PD.PositionType_ID=PT.PositionType_ID WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId} ) >5 THEN 34 WHEN ( SELECT PD.PositionType_ID FROM Position_Data PD LEFT JOIN Position_Type PT ON PD.PositionType_ID=PT.PositionType_ID WHERE PD.Position_ID=#{positionId} ) <=5 THEN 33 END)
